Instructions: Review Arrow Electronics history and global company overview.
Learn the basics of electronic component categories and functions.
Master packaging terms (Reels, Cut Tape, Tubes) and part numbering logic.
Step-by-step process for creating a user account on Arrow.com.
Learn to search for parts and manage the digital shopping cart.
Navigate the secure checkout flow and payment entry on Arrow.com.
Execute password reset protocols for Arrow.com and Verical.com.
Navigation and overview of the Verical.com marketplace.
Specific checkout and payment procedures for Verical.com orders.
Managing user profiles and order history within Verical accounts.
Ensure you are in 'Agent Console Lightning' app via the 9-dot App Launcher.
Select 'My Open and Flagged with Reminder' and click the Pin icon for default view.
Use the top Search Bar for global queries and 'Search this list' for filtered results.
Utilize standardized Quick Texts for efficiency in chat and case responses.
Learn to merge duplicate cases and create collaboration tasks for other teams.
How to quote parts currently in stock for both Arrow and Verical.
Procedures for managing quotes when stock or pricing is unavailable.
Standardized procedures for Request for Quote (RFQ) processing.
Perform technical part searches within the Oracle ERP system.
Process quotes and entries for items currently on backorder.
Learn to create and submit Quote Line Requests (QLR).
Create new customer accounts, including Bill-to and Ship-to sites.
Navigation and overview of the Order Management Tool (OMT) Ninja screen.
Check sales order status and download finalized invoices.
Learn how to unassign delivery and shipping details in Oracle.
Locate and identify system alerts on orders to take corrective action.
Review line-level alerts and execute necessary resolutions.
Add lines to booked orders and update existing order quantities.
Upload and validate Resale tax certificates for compliance.
Identify and resolve Trade Compliance holds to release orders.
Navigating CyberSource for payment verification and fraud checks.
Process Wire, Credit Card, and PayPal refunds within SWB.
Request order cancellations via the ETQ process in the Connect Now portal.
Forward proof to: vericalcia@arrow.com, wireremit@arrow.com, vericalremits@arrow.com. **Always include the account collector.**
Email dongsheng.sun@arrowasia.com or JB.SUPPORT@arrowasia.com for APAC-specific inventory problems.
